name: Budget Support
description: The donor relinquishes control of funds to the recipient government.

children.name: General budget support
children.description: Unearmarked contributions to a government's national treasury to support macroeconomic reforms or poverty reduction strategies.

children.name: Sector budget support
children.description: Earmarked for sector-specific policy and budget priorities, but managed through the recipient's national systems.

name: Core Contributions and Pooled Programmes and Funds
description: The donor shares control of funds with other stakeholders, including NGOs and multilaterals.

children.name: Core support to NGOs, PPPs, and research institutes
children.description: Discretionary funding for programmes developed and implemented by these entities.

children.name: Core contributions to multilateral institutions and global funds
children.description: Contributions pooled and managed by multilateral agencies.

children.name: Core contributions to multilateral institutions
children.description: Integrated into the institution's financial assets.

children.name: Core contributions to global funds
children.description: Includes GEF, CIFs, CERF, etc., recognised in OECD Annex 2.

children.name: Contributions to specific-purpose programmes and funds
children.description: Earmarked contributions for sectoral, thematic, or geographical programmes.

children.name: Multi-donor/multi-entity funding mechanisms
children.description: e.g. UN country pooled funds where multiple orgs implement.

children.name: Multi-donor/single-entity funding mechanisms
children.description: e.g. World Bank trust funds managed by a single agency.

children.name: Single-donor funding or earmarked windows
children.description: Where the donor retains influence over allocations.

children.name: Basket funds / pooled funding
children.description: Jointly managed accounts with specific purposes, shared reporting, and limited duration.

name: Project-Type Interventions
description: Specific inputs, activities, and outputs agreed with the partner country.

children.name: Project-type interventions
children.description: Defined activities with a time frame, budget, and outcomes. Includes donor-managed NGO and multilateral projects, feasibility studies, and appraisals.

name: Experts and Other Technical Assistance
description: Provision of knowledge and skills, outside a project framework.

children.name: Donor country personnel
children.description: Experts, consultants, and volunteers deployed to developing countries.

children.name: Other technical assistance
children.description: Includes research, south-south cooperation, local scholarships, cultural programmes, and conferences.

name: Scholarships and Student Costs in Donor Countries

children.name: Scholarships/training in donor country
children.description: Direct support to individual students or trainees.

children.name: Imputed student costs
children.description: Estimated tuition costs for students in donor countries.

name: Debt Relief
description: Any form of debt forgiveness or restructuring.

children.name: Debt relief
children.description: Includes forgiveness, conversions, buy-backs, rescheduling, and refinancing.

name: Administrative Costs Not Included Elsewhere
description: Back-office costs not covered by specific project or TA categories.

children.name: Administrative costs not included elsewhere
children.description: Includes salaries of in-house staff, situation analyses, and audits.

name: Other In-Donor Expenditures
description: Expenditures that do not result in a cross-border flow.

children.name: Development awareness
children.description: Activities to build public support for development cooperation.

children.name: Refugees/asylum seekers in donor countries
children.description: Basic assistance costs for up to 12 months when costs cannot be disaggregated.

children.name: Asylum-seekers ultimately accepted
children.description: Costs incurred before official recognition.

children.name: Asylum-seekers ultimately rejected
children.description: Costs incurred before final rejection decision.

children.name: Recognised refugees
children.description: Costs incurred after official recognition or resettlement.

children.name: Refugees/asylum seekers in other provider countries
children.description: Costs for refugees hosted in non-ODA-eligible countries.
